title: KBOB Life Cycle Assessment Data

penr_disposal.description: Primary Energy Non-Renewable for disposal (MJ oil-eq / functional unit)

ubp_production.description: Environmental impact points (Umweltbelastungspunkte, UBP) for production

functional_unit.description: Functional unit for the LCA values

quantity.description: Quantity of this material/product in this element (in functional units)
